outputs.output_descr: The project addresses the country's need to continue to fulfill its obligations under the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD). It is a significant contribution to Montenegro's efforts towards implementing the CBD Strategic Plan 2011-2020 at the national level. The project builds on the current status and achievements of Montenegro with respect to biodiversity planning and reporting. It aims to integrate Montenegro's obligations under the CBD into its national development and sectoral planning frameworks through a renewed and participative 'biodiversity planning' and strategizing process. This process is expected to produce measurable targets for biodiversity conservation and sustainable use.

project_descr: PIMS 5024, Enabling Activity, National Biodiversity Planning to Support the Implementation of the CBD 2011-2020 Strategic Plan
